title: RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK12015 Vibration Detection Module Overview
content: The RAK12015, a part of WisBlock Sensor, is a Vibration Detection Module that uses a high-precision sensor, the ANT-801S. This sensor is capable of detecting micro shocks or vibration without direction limits.
parent_content: The RAK12015, a part of WisBlock Sensor, is a Vibration Detection Module that uses a high-precision sensor, the ANT-801S. This sensor is capable of detecting micro shocks or vibration without direction limits.

title: RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Overview > Mounting > RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module Mounting
content:
The RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module can be mounted to the IO slot of the [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. **Figure 1** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12015 on a WisBlock Base module.  
> **Image:** RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Module Mounting
parent_content:
The RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module can be mounted to the IO slot of the [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. **Figure 1** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12015 on a WisBlock Base module.  
> **Image:** RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Module Mounting  
The sensor (ANT-801S) can be taken out of PCB by connector (J2 on PCB of RAK12015), so that the user can position the sensor outside of Wisblock to measure vibrations.

title: RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Chipset > Vendor and Part Number Information [TABLE]

RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Pin Definition > RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module Pinout [TABLE]
content:
The RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module comprises a standard WisBlock connector. The WisBlock connector allows the RAK12015 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in **Figure 2**.  
> **Image:** RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Module Pinout  
> **TIP:** NOTE
- The **3V3_S**, **AIN1**, and **GND** are connected to WisConnector.
parent_content:
The RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module comprises a standard WisBlock connector. The WisBlock connector allows the RAK12015 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in **Figure 2**.  
> **Image:** RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Module Pinout  
> **TIP:** NOTE
- The **3V3_S**, **AIN1**, and **GND** are connected to WisConnector.
- **3V3_S** voltage output from the WisBlock Base that powers the RAK12015 module can be controlled by the WisBlock Core via WB_IO2 (WisBlock IO2 pin). This makes the module ideal for low-power IoT projects since the WisBlock Core can totally disconnect the power of the RAK12015 module.

title: RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Mechanical Characteristics > WisConnector PCB Layout > WisConnector PCB Footprint and Recommendations [IMAGE]

RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12015 WisBlock Vibration Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Schematic Diagram > RAK12015 Vibration Sensor Output Behavior
content:
When there is no vibration detected, the AIN1 will be low. And when vibration occurs, AIN1 will produce a square wave. The voltage level of the square wave depends on the value of R1.  
The frequency of the square wave output depends on the vibrations received by the sensor. The sensor output is directly connected to the AN1 pin of the WisBlock Core.
parent_content:
When there is no vibration detected, the AIN1 will be low. And when vibration occurs, AIN1 will produce a square wave. The voltage level of the square wave depends on the value of R1.  
The frequency of the square wave output depends on the vibrations received by the sensor. The sensor output is directly connected to the AN1 pin of the WisBlock Core.  
There are optional components (R3 and U1) that are not mounted in the PCB but can be used to do signal conditioning. The output of this optional circuit is connected to IO4 of the WisBlock Core.  
> **Image:** Schematic of RAK12015 Module

parent_content:
When there is no vibration detected, the AIN1 will be low. And when vibration occurs, AIN1 will produce a square wave. The voltage level of the square wave depends on the value of R1.  
The frequency of the square wave output depends on the vibrations received by the sensor. The sensor output is directly connected to the AN1 pin of the WisBlock Core.  
There are optional components (R3 and U1) that are not mounted in the PCB but can be used to do signal conditioning. The output of this optional circuit is connected to IO4 of the WisBlock Core.  
> **Image:** Schematic of RAK12015 Module
